I

Incentive - Class in eu.cassandra.sim.math.response
This class is used for implementing the (monetary) incentives proposed to the consumers in order to respond accordingly.
Incentive(int, int, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class eu.cassandra.sim.math.response.Incentive
A constructor of an incentive where all of the input variables are known.
IncentiveVector - Class in eu.cassandra.sim.math.response
This class is used for implementing an array of incentives that are a result of the analysis of the available pricing schemes (Basic and New).
IncentiveVector(double[], double[]) - Constructor for class eu.cassandra.sim.math.response.IncentiveVector
The constructor of the Incentive Vector.
